tit.j: 高松エクスプレス京都号
tit.cmt: 読みに合せて-goとし、括弧説明を補足しました。

sen.j: 高松エクスプレス京都号（たかまつエクスプレス きょうとごう）は、京都市、乙訓郡大山崎町、高槻市と鳴門市、東かがわ市、さぬき市、三木町、高松市を結ぶ昼行高速バスである。
sen.e: Takamatsu Express bound for Kyoto is a daytime highway bus connecting Kyoto City, Oyamazaki-cho of Otokuni-gun, Takatsuki City, Naruto City, Higashi Kagawa City, Sanuki City, Miki-cho and Takamatsu City.

Takamatsu Express Kyoto-go (Takamatsu Express bound for Kyoto) is a daytime highway bus connecting Kyoto City, Oyamazaki-cho of Otokuni-gun, Takatsuki City, Naruto City, Higashi Kagawa City, Sanuki City, Miki-cho and Takamatsu City.
sen.cmt: 読みに合せて-goとし、括弧説明を補足しました。
sen.e: Takamatsu Express Kyoto-go (Takamatsu Express bound for Kyoto) is a daytime highway bus connecting Kyoto City, Oyamazaki-cho of Otokuni-gun, Takatsuki City, Naruto City, Higashi Kagawa City, Sanuki City, Miki-cho and Takamatsu City.

sen.j: 全便座席指定制のため、乗車には予約が必要。
sen.e: All the services are in reserved-seat system, thus reservation must be made.
All the services are in reserved-seat system, thus reservation must be made.
All the services are in reserved-seat system, thus reservation must be made.

sen.j: このバスは愛称を、西日本JRバス、JR四国バス、京阪バス、四国高速バスの4社共に高松エクスプレス京都号（たかまつエクスプレスきょうとごう）に統一している。
sen.e: All the four companies, West JR Bus Company, JR Shikoku Bus, Keihan Bus and Shikoku Express Bus use the same name of Takamatsu Express bound for Kyoto for this bus.
All the four companies, West JR Bus Company, JR Shikoku Bus, Keihan Bus and Shikoku Express Bus use the same name of Takamatsu Express Kyoto-go for this bus.
sen.cmt: Takamatsu Express Kyoto-goに訂正しました。
sen.e: All the four companies, West JR Bus Company, JR Shikoku Bus, Keihan Bus and Shikoku Express Bus use the same name of Takamatsu Express Kyoto-go for this bus.

sen.j: 便名コードは390xx。
sen.e: The service identification number is 390xx.
The service identification number is 390xx.
The service identification number is 390xx.

sen.j: 神戸 - 高松・丸亀線や大阪 - 高松・丸亀線と同じく民鉄系（京阪バス・四国高速バス）と、JR系（西日本JRバス・JR四国バス）できっぷ・回数券の共通化、予約・発券場所の共通化、時刻表の共通化を行っている。
sen.e: Like the Kobe-Takamatsu/Marugame route and Osaka-Takamatsu/Marugame route, tickets, coupon tickets, reservation and ticketing offices, and timetables are shared between private railway affiliates (Keihan Bus and Shikoku Express Bus) and JR affiliates (West JR Bus Company and JR Shikoku Bus Company).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Like the Kobe-Takamatsu/Marugame route and Osaka-Takamatsu/Marugame route, tickets, coupon tickets, reservation and ticketing offices, and timetables are shared between private railway affiliates (Keihan Bus and Shikoku Express Bus) and JR affiliates (West JR Bus Company and JR Shikoku Bus Company).

Like the Kobe-Takamatsu/Marugame route and Osaka-Takamatsu/Marugame route, tickets, coupon tickets, reservation and ticketing offices, and timetables are shared between private railway affiliates (Keihan Bus and Shikoku Express Bus) and JR affiliates (West JR Bus Company and JR Shikoku Bus Company).

sen.j: しかし、これらの路線とは異なり、2001年3月の運行開始当初から共同運行している。
sen.e: However, unlike these routes, joint operation of Takamatsu Express bound for Kyoto has been conducted since the operation start in March 2001.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: However, unlike these routes, joint operation of Takamatsu Express Kyoto-go has been conducted since the operation start in March 2001.
sen.cmt: bound for Kyotoを Kyoto-goに訂正しました。
sen.e: However, unlike these routes, joint operation of Takamatsu Express Kyoto-go has been conducted since the operation start in March 2001.

sen.j: 西日本JRバス・JR四国バスに関しては、親会社の鉄道線と乗客を奪い合う構図となっている。
sen.e: West JR Bus Company and JR Shikoku Bus Company are competing for passengers with the parental railway company as a result.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: West JR Bus Company and JR Shikoku Bus Company are competing for passengers with the parental railway company as a result.
West JR Bus Company and JR Shikoku Bus Company are competing for passengers with the parental railway company as a result.

sen.j: 乗客が鉄道の特急より利幅の薄いバスに流れることは特に四国旅客鉄道グループにとっては深刻な問題である。
sen.e: It is a serious problem for Shikoku Passenger Rail Group that passengers tend to use buses that have lower margin than limited express trains
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It is a serious problem for Shikoku Passenger Rail Group that passengers tend to use buses that have lower margin than limited express trains.
sen.cmt: ピリオド補足しました。
sen.e: It is a serious problem for Shikoku Passenger Rail Group that passengers tend to use buses that have lower margin than limited express trains.

sen.j: （このことは京阪神～高知、松山方面の系統にも通ずる所がある。)
sen.e: (The same is true of the lines connecting between Keihanshin and Kochi or Matsuyama area.)
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: (The same is true of the lines connecting between Keihanshin and Kochi or Matsuyama area.)
(The same is true of the lines connecting between Keihanshin and Kochi or Matsuyama area.)

sen.j: (特急列車を多く走らせているために実際の所高知・松山方面の方が深刻な問題になっている）。
sen.e: This problem is more serious in the Kochi/Matsuyama directions, as more frequent Limited Express train services are provided in these directions.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: (This problem is more serious in the Kochi/Matsuyama directions, as more frequent Limited Express train services are provided in these directions.)

sen.j: 沿革
sen.e: History
History
History
March 30, 2001
March 30, 2001
March 30, 2001

sen.j: - 西日本JRバス、四国旅客鉄道（当時）、京阪バス、四国高速バスが高松エクスプレス京都号の運行を開始。
sen.e: - West JR Bus Company, Shikoku Railway Company (at that time), Keihan Bus and Shikoku Express Bus have started the operation of Takamatsu Express bound for Kyoto.
West JR Bus Company, Shikoku Railway Company (at that time), Keihan Bus and Shikoku Express Bus have started the operation of Takamatsu Express Kyoto-go.
sen.cmt: 文頭のハイフン削除しました。Kyoto-goに訂正しました。
sen.e: West JR Bus Company, Shikoku Railway Company (at that time), Keihan Bus and Shikoku Express Bus have started the operation of Takamatsu Express Kyoto-go.

sen.j: 京都駅～高松駅 (香川県)を名神高速・中国道・山陽道・神戸淡路鳴門自動車道（明石海峡大橋）・徳島県道12号鳴門池田線・高松自動車道経由、ハイデッカーまたはスーパーハイデッカー4列シート車で運行。
sen.e: The operation is from Kyoto Station to Takamatsu Station (Kagawa Prefecture) via Meishin Expressway, Chugoku Expressway, Sanyo Expressway, Kobe Awaji Naruto Jidoshado Expressway (Akashi-Kaikyo Bridge), Tokushima Prefectural Road 12 Naruto Ikeda Road and Takamatsu Expressway, using a High Decker or Super High Decker equipped with four-row seats.

The operation is from Kyoto Station to Takamatsu Station (Kagawa Prefecture) via Meishin Expressway, Chugoku Expressway, Sanyo Expressway, Kobe Awaji Naruto Jidoshado Expressway (Akashi-Kaikyo Bridge), Tokushima Prefectural Road 12 Naruto Ikeda Road and Takamatsu Expressway, using a High Decker or Super High Decker equipped with four-row seats.

The operation is from Kyoto Station to Takamatsu Station (Kagawa Prefecture) via Meishin Expressway, Chugoku Expressway, Sanyo Expressway, Kobe Awaji Naruto Jidoshado Expressway (Akashi-Kaikyo Bridge), Tokushima Prefectural Road 12 Naruto Ikeda Road and Takamatsu Expressway, using a High Decker or Super High Decker equipped with four-row seats.

sen.j: - 高松道鳴門インターチェンジ～板野IC開通により経路変更。
sen.e: - The route has been changed with the opening of the section between Takamatsu Narutomon Interchange and Itano Interchange.
The route has been changed with the opening of the section between Takamatsu Narutomon Interchange and Itano Interchange.
sen.cmt: 文頭のハイフン削除しました。
sen.e: The route has been changed with the opening of the section between Takamatsu Narutomon Interchange and Itano Interchange.
August 1, 2002
August 1, 2002
August 1, 2002

sen.j: - 鳴門西パーキングエリア停留所を新設。

Narutonishi Parking Area Bus Stop has been newly established.
sen.cmt: 文頭のハイフン削除しました。
sen.e: Narutonishi Parking Area Bus Stop has been newly established.

sen.e: - Minor change of the operation routes
Minor change of the operation routes

sen.e: Minor change of the operation routes

sen.j: ゆめタウン高松、高松中央インター南停留所を新設、高松中央インター口停留所を廃止。
sen.e: Dream Town Takamatsu and Takamatsu-chuo Interchange Minami Bus Stops have been newly established, and Takamatsu-chuo Interchange Entrance Bus Stop has been abolished.
sen.cmt: 高松中央インター口停留所、用語集になかったため、造語しました。Takamatsu-chuo Interchange Entrance
sen.e: Yume Town Takamatsu and Takamatsu-chuo Interchange Minami Bus Stops have been newly established, and Takamatsu-chuo Interchange Entrance Bus Stop has been abolished.
sen.cmt: 読みのYumeに訂正しました。
sen.e: Yume Town Takamatsu and Takamatsu-chuo Interchange Minami Bus Stops have been newly established, and Takamatsu-chuo Interchange Entrance Bus Stop has been abolished.
October 1, 2005

sen.j: - 名神大山崎、名神高槻、高松中央インターバスターミナル（ただし乗車のみで、高松中央インター南停留所はこの時点ではそのまま）、栗林公園前停留所を新設。
sen.e: - Meishin-Oyamazaki, Meishin-Takatsuki, Takamatsu-chuo Interchange (this stop is for loading only, and Takamatsu-chuo Interchange Minami Bus Stop was kept used at this time) and Ritsurin Garden Bus Stops have been newly established.

Meishin-Oyamazaki, Meishin-Takatsuki, Takamatsu-chuo Interchange (this stop is for loading only, and Takamatsu-chuo Interchange Minami Bus Stop was kept used at this time) and Ritsurin Garden Bus Stops have been newly established.

sen.j: - 土、日、祝のみ1日7往復に増便
sen.e: The number of round-trip services per day has been increased to seven on Saturdays, Sundays and holidays.
The number of round-trip services per day has been increased to seven on Saturdays, Sundays and holidays.

sen.j: バスの乗車券はチケットセンター、コンビニ（ローソン、ファミリーマートなど）、旅行会社で事前に購入する。
sen.e: The bus ticket has to be purchased in advance at a ticket center, convenience store (Lawson, Familymart, etc.) or travel agency.
The bus ticket has to be purchased in advance at a ticket center, convenience store (Lawson, Familymart, etc.) or travel agency.
The bus ticket has to be purchased in advance at a ticket center, convenience store (Lawson, Familymart, etc.) or travel agency.

sen.j: 電話・インターネットで予約ができる。
sen.e: Reservation can be made by telephone or via the Internet.
Reservation can be made by telephone or via the Internet.
Reservation can be made by telephone or via the Internet.

sen.j: 全便、全国のみどりの窓口でも乗車券が購入できる。
sen.e: All the tickets can be purchased at JR Ticket Office.
All the tickets can be purchased at JR Ticket Office.
All the tickets can be purchased at JR Ticket Office.

sen.j: JR西日本の京阪神地区の窓口やJR四国管内の窓口以外では発券に戸惑われることもある。
sen.e: A clerk at a window other than those of JR-West in the Keihanshin area and of JR Shikoku may be inexperienced in issuing these tickets.
A clerk at a window other than those of JR-West in the Keihanshin area and of JR Shikoku may be inexperienced in issuing these tickets.
